aws::graph::propositions: # AWS Segment and Financial Information
AWS segment consists of amounts earned from global sales of compute services for start-ups.
AWS segment consists of amounts earned from global sales of storage services for start-ups.
AWS segment consists of amounts earned from global sales of database services for start-ups.
AWS segment consists of amounts earned from global sales of other services for start-ups.
AWS segment consists of amounts earned from global sales of compute services for enterprises.
AWS segment consists of amounts earned from global sales of storage services for enterprises.
AWS segment consists of amounts earned from global sales of database services for enterprises.
AWS segment consists of amounts earned from global sales of other services for enterprises.
AWS segment consists of amounts earned from global sales of compute services for government agencies.
AWS segment consists of amounts earned from global sales of storage services for government agencies.
AWS segment consists of amounts earned from global sales of database services for government agencies.
AWS segment consists of amounts earned from global sales of other services for government agencies.
AWS segment consists of amounts earned from global sales of compute services for academic institutions.
AWS segment consists of amounts earned from global sales of storage services for academic institutions.
AWS segment consists of amounts earned from global sales of database services for academic institutions.
AWS segment consists of amounts earned from global sales of other services for academic institutions.
North America net sales were $315,880 million for the year ended December 31, 2022.
North America net sales were $352,828 million for the year ended December 31, 2023.
North America net sales were $387,497 million for the year ended December 31, 2024.
North America operating expenses were $318,727 million for the year ended December 31, 2022.
North America operating expenses were $337,951 million for the year ended December 31, 2023.
North America operating expenses were $362 million for the year ended December 31, 2024.

/FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 8 - Financial Statements and Supplementary Data/NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS/Note 10 â€” SEGMENT INFORMATION/

text:
###### AWS

The AWS segment consists of amounts earned from global sales of compute, storage, database, and other services for start-ups, enterprises, government agencies, and academic institutions.

Information on reportable segments and reconciliation to consolidated net income (loss) is as follows (in millions):

|                                               |   | Year Ended December 31, 
                    2022 |   |    2023 |   |    2024 |
|----------------------------------------------|----|--|------------------------:|----|--|--------:|----|--|--------:|
| North America                                 |   |                         |   |   |
| Net sales                                     |                 315,880 | 352,828 | 387,497 |
| Operating expenses                            |   |                 318,727 |   | 337,951 |   | 362,
